title: Riot at lease give turrets 50 armor & MR and make them fire 1 time a second.
body: So we feel like they actually do something besides give gold for being destroyed.

replies.body:
While I want towers to be hit harder, I also dont want them to be tankier.  I think upping the attack speed is a pretty good solution as it would make juggling tower agro harder (not impossible just harder) and make them hit harder the longer you were under them while not completely destroying split-pushing as they are still easy to kill. 

Just my two cents.
